	<GetAcct>

			<MsgId>575b3623-5adf-4752-8da9-a159a179ec9f</MsgId>	<!-- Required by ISO, not used by Moja -->
			<CreDtTm>2020-05-14T15:07:38.6875000+03:00</CreDtTm>	<!-- Required by ISO, not used by Moja -->
		</MsgHdr>
		<AcctQryDef>
			<AcctCrit>

					<SchCrit>

							<CtctDtls>
								<MobNb>+250-788301607</MobNb>		<!--	We want to know about this mobile number	-->
							</CtctDtls>
						</AcctOwnr>
					</SchCrit>
				</NewCrit>
			</AcctCrit>
		</AcctQryDef>
	</GetAcct>
</Document>
